text: There is a Koufu cafe nearby and a Prime supermarket. Playground is also quite good, only just a few rusty edges. However, the sculptures are dirty and rough. Walkways are also a bit old-looking. Other than this, it's a good park.
A nice place within hdb building for play and it is honestly very nostalgic. Definitely would recommend checking it out :)

Perfect place for families to gather and enjoy a morning...or really anytime. The palms and other trees are lush and beautiful.  Plenty of sun or shade plus benches to relax. Near some food/beverage spots. In between housing blocks. Easily reached by bus or MRT.  The sculptures are all wonderfully innocuous, from a whale or fish shape to bocce ball looking blobs to rounded fused cubes and so forth. Nothing that would scare a 3 year old or look spooky in the shadows of an evening stroll. Playground areas here and there. Walkways on varied ground surfaces.  Good neighborhood vibe.
Awesome feels very serene tucked into neighbourhood vicinity. Offers variety of sculptures (as the name goes) ..One can go the food court nearby for refreshments after exercise.

Nice park with a playground, fitness corner and sculptures.
Good place to relax and chill.
